paramobject.name: Config
paramobject.description: SIMCOM Config Container

paramobject.name: Functions
paramobject.description: List of Custom Functions for the SIMCOM Module

paramobject.name: ErrorCallback
paramobject.description: Generic Error Callback to the Application Layer

paramobject.name: GenericRxCallback
paramobject.description: Generic Reception Callback to the Application Layer

paramobject.name: DataRxIndication
paramobject.description: Receive Indication Callback to the Application Layer

paramobject.name: DataTxConfirmation
paramobject.description: Transmission Confirmation Callback to the Application Layer

paramobject.name: CustomSendByteFunction
paramobject.description: Custom Send Byte function for the SIMCOM

paramobject.name: Calls
paramobject.description: Container to define parameters for Calls and Dialing Feature

paramobject.name: Enabled
paramobject.description: Enables or Disables the Calls and Dialing Feature

paramobject.name: Network
paramobject.description: Network Container to control the SIMCOM Network related functionalities

paramobject.name: NetworkClockSyncCount
paramobject.description: Maximum number of count the SIMCOM module shall take to synchronize with the network time

paramobject.name: HTTP
paramobject.description: SIMCOM HTTP Control

paramobject.name: Enabled
paramobject.description: Enables or Disables the HTTP Functionality of SIMCOM

paramobject.name: URL
paramobject.description: HTTP Server URL

paramobject.name: HTTPMethod
paramobject.description: HTTP Method being used by the micro-controller

paramobject.name: General
paramobject.description: SIMCOM General Container

paramobject.name: IncompleteResponseRetryCount
paramobject.description: If a data started to receive, but stuck without the SIMCOM STOP Command, then SW will come out of this state after this many Retry

paramobject.name: FailureRetryCount
paramobject.description: Defines the maximum number of Retries upon a re ed error

paramobject.name: MainFunctionRef
paramobject.description: SIMCOM Main Function Process Reference

paramobject.name: AlivenessErrorTime
paramobject.description: SIMCOM Aliveness Error time (in milli-seconds). After this time of Inactivity, SIMCOM will report Error to the Application Layer

paramobject.name: DefaultTimeoutTime
paramobject.description: Default Timeout time (in milli-seconds) for sent requests

paramobject.name: BufferRef
paramobject.description: Buffer Reference for the SIMCOM
